web.homepage.tagline1.text: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.

web.homepage.tagline2.text: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.

web.homepage.secret_hint.text: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.

web.homepage.secret_form_more_text3.text: and be able to send the secret by email.

web.homepage.cta_subtitle.text: Elevate your brand and share with confidence

web.homepage.need_free_account.text: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.

web.homepage.password_generation_descrip.text: Click "Generate Password" to create a secure random password that you can share.

web.homepage.protip1.text: Your message will self-destruct after being viewed. The link can only be accessed once.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline2.text: Secure messaging service is for internal use only.

web.homepage.authonly.tagline1.text: If you have an account, please log in to continue.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline2.text: This service is setup for internal use only.

web.homepage.disabled.tagline1.text: User interface and login capabilities are not available.

web.homepage.secure_your_brand_build_cus.text: Secure your brand, build customer trust with links from your domain.

web.homepage.a_trusted_way_to_share_sens.text: A trusted way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after being viewed.

web.homepage.send_sensitive_information_.text: Send sensitive information that can only be viewed once

web.homepage.this_is_a_private_instance_.text: This is a private instance. Only authorized team members can generate new secure links.

web.homepage.onetime_secret_helps_us_sha.text: Onetime Secret helps us share sensitive information securely while maintaining our professional facade.

web.homepage.information_shared_through_.text: Information shared through this service can only be accessed once. Once viewed, the content is permanently deleted to ensure confidentiality.
